text: Blake Bodily (born January 13, 1998) is an American soccer player who plays for Portland Timbers in Major League Soccer. ==Career== Bodily began his youth career with the Boise Nationals before joining the Portland Timbers Academy in 2014. On June 29, 2015, he made his professional debut for USL club Portland Timbers 2 in a 2–0 defeat to Seattle Sounders FC 2. In January 2020, Bodily signed a homegrown contract with Portland Timbers and forwent his senior year with Washington. == Honors == ;Individual * Pac-12 Conference Men's Soccer Freshman of the Year: 2017 * Pac-12 Conference Men's Soccer Player of the Year: 2019 ==References== ==External links== *USSF Development Academy bio *Top Drawer Soccer bio Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:All-American men's college soccer players Category:American soccer players Category:Washington Huskies men's soccer players Category:Homegrown Players (MLS) Category:Portland Timbers players Category:Portland Timbers 2 players Category:Portland Timbers U23s players Category:Association football midfielders Category:People from Eagle, Idaho Category:Soccer players from Idaho Category:USL Championship players Category:USL League Two players
title: Blake Bodily
